node.title: How do you plan on spending your leap second?
node.author: davido

data.field: Watching my life flash before my eyes. Seeing how high I can count, "One, Two, th" Considering all the Britney Spears songs I like. Computing the answer to the universe on my new 3GHz dual-core system. Procrastinating. Watching the clock. Catching up on my beauty sleep. Stopping to smell the roses. Trying to get the jump on everyone else at quick-posting an answer to PerlMonks.
